story.iWant: network failures handled gracefully with auto-reconnection
story.soThat: transient issues don't break my workflow

story-context.acceptanceCriteria: 1. Given** network connection drops during CLI operation 2. When** CLI detects failure 3. Then** CLI automatically retries with exponential backoff 4. And** displays: "Connection lost. Retrying... (attempt 2/5)" 5. And** on success, continues operation seamlessly 6. And** on persistent failure, displays: "Network error. Check connection and retry."
